"""
    Celery worker base
"""

import sentry_sdk
from celery import Celery

from celery.result import AsyncResult
from sentry_sdk.integrations.celery import CeleryIntegration

from {{__app_name__celeryt__}}.get_settings import get_settings

# avoid memory leak from celery
delattr(AsyncResult, '__del__')

# Get settings
settings = get_settings()

# SENTRY INIT
sentry_sdk.init(
    dsn=settings.SENTRY_DSN,
    release=settings.SENTRY_RELEASE,
    environment=settings.SENTRY_ENV,
    integrations=[CeleryIntegration()]
)


# CELERY CONF
BROKER_TRANSPORT_OPTIONS = {'confirm_public': True}
CELERY_BROKER = "amqp://{user}:{password}@{host}:{port}{vhost}".format(
    user=settings.AMQP_USER,
    password=settings.AMQP_PASSWORD,
    host=settings.AMQP_HOST,
    port=settings.AMQP_PORT,
    vhost=settings.AMQP_VHOST
)

# CELERY INIT
app = Celery(
    settings.CELERY_APP_NAME,
    backend=settings.CELERY_BACKEND,
    broker=CELERY_BROKER,
    include=[f'{settings.CELERY_APP_NAME}.tasks']
)
app.config_from_object(BROKER_TRANSPORT_OPTIONS)
app.conf.timezone = settings.CELERY_TIMEZONE


# BASIC DEBUG TASK
@app.task
def debug_task(msg: str) -> None:
    print("this channel works. {msg}".format(msg=msg))


# BASIC DEBUG TASK WITH RETRY
@app.task(
    autoretry_for=(RuntimeError, NotImplementedError),
    retry_backoff=settings.CELERY_RETRY_BACKOFF,
    retry_kwargs={'max_retries': settings.CELERY_RETRY_MAX})
def debug_retry_task() -> None:
    raise RuntimeError
